price: Kwani! Kama haachi, tutamkokota kwa shungi la nywele!
arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
footnotes: Kwa kumkemea huyu mwenye kuzuia, anaambiwa kama hakuacha hayo anayo yafanya, basi hapana shaka tutamkokota kwa nguvu tukimshika kwa shungi lake la nywele mpaka Motoni!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kallā la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nāṣiyati
